# CHANGELOG

<a name="3.0.0"></a>
### 3.0.0 (2021-05-10)

#### Misc

*   drop support Node.js less than 12 version
*   bump deps


<a name="2.0.0"></a>
### 2.0.0 (2020-10-16)

#### Misc

*   drop support Node.js less than 10 version
*   bump deps and refactoring


<a name="1.0.5"></a>
### 1.0.5 (2017-09-12)

#### Misc

*   bump deps and refactoring


<a name="1.0.4"></a>
### 1.0.4 (2017-08-23)

#### Misc

*   bump deps


<a name="1.0.3"></a>
### 1.0.3 (2016-05-10)

#### Features

*   `build` method accepts the optional `options` parameter to init `libbase64.Encoder` instance


<a name="1.0.2"></a>
### 1.0.2 (2016-05-10)

#### Bug Fixes

*   return correct attachment instance


<a name="1.0.1"></a>
### 1.0.1 (2016-05-10)

#### Features

*   return the instance instead of content

#### Bug Fixes

*   remove default base64 content transer encoding


<a name="1.0.0"></a>
### 1.0.0 (2016-05-10)


#### Features

*   initial release
